divs: Sighting Detailsit was in the early 80s, i was hanging out in the park laying down taking a nap on the football benches when suddenly i woke up to a flash , when i opened my eyes i saw up in the sky two round shape flying objects full of light following each other , each time the first one curved the second one did the same, i continued watching for about 15 minutes until they disapeared. i told my family about it but everyone just laught, so i never said nothing else to no one until now.
